item.description:
Story Slam, Season IV in Fall 2012!

Saturday afternoons at our newest venue -- the Rosebud Bar and Grill!

Doors @ 3:00pm

Admission: $8.00 in advance $10.00 at the door.

Tickets in advance are recommended.

Buy your tickets here:
http://massmouth.eventbrite.com

Theme: "Labels"

Emcee: Your host, Paula Junn, is the social media director at massmouth, inc. Paula also takes photographs, makes jewelry, writes poems, and tells stories (Rather than putting labels on herself such as "photographer; jewelry designer; poet; storyteller," she's more focused on the action).

Special Guest: Cacky Mellor is the Founder and Executive Director of The Label Project Inc., a start up non-profit based in Boston. The Label Project Inc.'s mission is to bring awareness to how labels, stereotypes and bullying impact individual's lives. To date, Cacky has done fifteen performances around the world. Performance cities include: New York, Boston, Hanoi, Paris, London, and Brisbane. Cacky's latest work with The Label Project Inc is the development of "Impact: An Exploration of the Physical Impact of Words," a short film.

What is a Story Slam? A story slam is a contest of stories by known and undiscovered talent. Themes are posted on our events pages (www.massmouth.com) and story slammers sign up on the night to tell a 5-minute short story on the evening's theme. Ten names will be drawn at random from a box. A team of 5 volunteer judges - interested amateurs, storytellers, theater people and members of the audience who love stories - evaluate how well each story is told, how well it is constructed, how well the story explores, connects and/or reveals some truth about the theme and, how well it honors the time limit. The 2 highest-scoring tellers are awarded prizes and an opportunity to perform at the "BigMouthOff" at the at the end of the slam season (Sept  - April).

For more info, visit: http://massmouth.ning.com/forum/topics/story-slam-rules-pr-what-is
"Located behind the historic Rosebud Diner, The Rosebud Bar and Grill is Davis Square's hidden jewel.  This beautiful music club offers a full-service bar and extensive bar menu."

For more info, visit:

http://www.rosebudbarandgrill.com/

 

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:
SUBWAY: RED LINE TO DAVIS SQ
BUS ROUTES:  87, 88, 89, 90, 94, 96

View Larger Map

 

• Like us on Facebook @ https://www.facebook.com/massmouth.org

• Follow us on Twitter @massmouth

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: massmouth Season IV @ Rosebud Bar and Grill - Slam #1 "Labels"
